title: Katie Piper's Weekend Escape
overview: The host of this brand new series is television presenter Katie Piper. The show will be shot at an exclusive retreat located in the British Countryside celebrating the very best of our country's natural beauty. Each week Katie and a celebrity guest will be introduced to new pamper treatments and fun activities focused on health and wellbeing. Meanwhile, a nutritionist and health-food expert will be on hand to introduce Katie and her guest to a range of drinks and foods throughout each show.In addition to its focus on lifestyle and wellbeing, Katie Piper's Weekend Escape will also feature powerful human-interest stories. A segment entitled ‘Katie's Haircut Hero' will throw the spotlight on someone who has braved adversity or done something extraordinary for an individual or community. The ‘hero' will be rewarded with a session with celebrity hairdresser Michael Douglas, whose mission is to help people feel confident about their hair and themselves. Michael has previously appeared on The One Show, This MorningandGood Morning Britain.
